Change IP and hostname Redhat (relay1, relay2, ns1 and ns2)

Swap identity of these servers.

  1. Shut down old server(s) OR change their IPs to the temporary IPs and shutdown.
  2. Login to the new server and backup config files
    mkdir backups
sudo cp /etc/hosts backups/
sudo cp /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0 backups/
sudo cp /etc/sysconfig/network backups/
  3. Change the IP address
    sudo vi /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
  4. Change the hostname
    sudo vi /etc/sysconfig/network
  5. Change the hosts file
    sudo vi /etc/hosts
  6. From the console, restart the network
    sudo service network restart

    OR just reboot 

    sudo init 6
  7. Re-define the hosts on Kickstart / Cobbler.
  8. Cleanup the host SSH keys on NIM server and the build server.
